title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The Open Type dialog should only display non-obfuscated classes and exclude the obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d).
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the software.
2. Open the Open Type dialog.
3. Observe the presence of obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) in the dialog.
